Camping in the woods is just what the doctor ordered and this trailer will provide all the interior comforts you need! There is a three burner cooktop and a microwave oven to prepare meals each day, plus an 8 cu. ft. 12V refrigerator for cold items. After your meal is made, you can dine at the booth dinette or relax on the jack-knife sofa, and these areas can become sleeping space for two to three guests at night. The full bath with a tub/shower means you won't have to use the camp's facilities and the 16' power awning will provide protection from the sun as you visit with other campers!

 

The Jayco Jay Flight SLX travel trailer is quite easy to own because it is lightweight for an easier towing experience. Built on a fully integrated A-frame with galvanized-steel, impact-resistant wheel wells, the Jay Flight SLX has quality at its very foundation. That quality continues on to the electric self-adjusting brakes, easy-lube hubs, Magnum Truss roof system, and LP quick connect. Some of what the mandatory Customer Value Package includes is backup camera prep, Keyed-Alike entry and baggage doors, marine grade exterior speakers, and an on-demand tankless water heater.

Treat yourself to a weekend of fun in this Imagine XLS travel trailer! Whether it's just you and your spouse, or you've chosen to bring along a group of friends, this trailer will meet the need. The front bedroom can sleep two people on the walk-around queen-size bed. units.description: New 2026 Wayfinder RV GO LITE LTD Solo
units.details:
2026 Go Lite Solo: Simple and Camp Ready Rig for the Solo Adventurer

 

The Go Lite Solo travel trailer offers the functionality of a full-size RV in a lightweight, compact design that’s easy to tow with an SUV. It’s an excellent choice for adventurers who want to explore the great outdoors without upgrading their vehicle or dealing with the challenges of towing a large camper.

 

Key Features of the Go Lite Solo

Practical Design:

The innovative design of the Go Lite Solo provides an impressive amount of practical camping features that you won't find in other RVs of this size. Outside the Solo, you'll find a full kitchen, inside it is simply your sleeping solution and smart storage solutions. Get ready to get on the road!

 

Lightweight and Easy to Tow:

With a UVW of just 1,793 pounds, the Solo is exceptionally lightweight, making it towable by smaller vehicles like SUVs, compact trucks, and some capable minivans. With an exterior length of only 13'8", its compact design allows you to access tight camping spots that larger RVs simply can’t reach.

 

Adventure-Ready Design:

Built on a custom chassis tailored to its floorplan, the Go Lite Solo offers extra support where it’s needed most. With an adjustable axle and heavy-duty off-road tires, this travel trailer is ready to take on rugged terrain and go wherever your adventures lead.

 

Why Choose Go Lite?

Go Lite redefines lightweight travel trailers, making adventure accessible to everyone. Weighing as little as 2,000 pounds, Go Lite trailers can be towed by most SUVs, V6 vehicles, and even minivans. Unlike other compact RVs, Go Lite combines affordability and functionality with essential features like a full kitchen, bathroom, and smart storage solutions. With Go Lite, you can embark on every adventure without compromise.

units.description: Used 2023 Forest River RV Surveyor Legend 260BHLE
units.details:
Forest River Surveyor Legend travel trailer 260BHLE highlights:

  • Oversized Bunk Beds
  • Pantry
  • Front Private Bedroom
  • Pass-Through Storage
  • Full Bath

 

Every trip to the campground will be spent in comfort with this single slide out travel trailer. Once you arrive at the site, remove the kayaks or bikes from the rear storage door, start lunch on the outside kitchen, and put out the 15' power awning with LED lights. The interior includes a booth dinette slide with EZ access storage, a bar top with stools, plus an HD LED TV for movie nights. After a day of fun, head to the front private bedroom for a great night's rest on the queen bed, and you can store your belongings in the dual bedroom wardrobes!

 

With any Surveyor Legend travel trailer by Forest River you will enjoy quality craftsmanship, convenient amenities, and at-home comforts. The Azdel composite panels provide a longer-lasting trailer, and the power tongue jack will get you back on the road in no-time. Each model includes the Surveyor Legend Package that comes standard with pleated night shades, an automotive style tinted front windshield, a multi-zone Bluetooth stereo, and more. You'll enjoy the one-touch electric awning with LED lights outdoors, plus rooftop solar prep and rear camera prep to make parking easier than ever. The inside will have you feeling right at home with Surf(x) seamless countertops, Congoleum designer carefree linoleum, residential faucets in the bath and kitchen, plus many more essentials you won't want to camp without.

2026 Grand Design Imagine travel trailer 2800BH highlights:
  • Double-Size Bunks
  • Dual Entry
  • Bike Storage
  • Outside Kitchen
 
Where will you go with this Imagine travel trailer? The possibilities are endless! You can take your family on an exciting excursion because this trailer has enough sleeping space for everyone with a 60" x 80" queen bed in the private bedroom, a U-shaped dinette and tri-fold sofa in the main living area, and there is a set of 47" x 76" bunk beds with privacy curtains in the rear corner. You can come and go as you please with two entry doors, and the outdoor griddle and refrigerator will be fun to use when the weather is nice. The flip-up countertop extension will make it easier to prepare delicious home cooked meals and the shoe storage area helps to keep things neat and tidy.
 
Just imagine leaving the world behind and secluding yourself away with your favorite people in your Grand Design Imagine travel trailer! The Imagine has been designed to enjoy extended season camping and includes a high-capacity furnace, a heated and enclosed underbelly with suspended tanks, a designated heat duct to the subfloor, and a high-density roof insulation with attic vent. You'll have maximum head room on the interior with 81" radius ceilings, and large panoramic windows to let in natural lighting. The exclusive drop-frame pass-through storage compartment is going to allow you to bring along lots of equipment, and the universal docking station is an all-in-one location for utilities and hook-ups. You'll also have industry-leading tank capacities so that you can fill and empty your tanks less often.

properties.features: Bunkhouse|Front Bedroom|Outdoor Kitchen|Two Entry/Exit Doors|U Shaped Dinette

units.details:
Grand Design Transcend travel trailer 265BHT highlights:

  • Theater Seating
  • Dual Entry Doors
  • Double-Size Bunks
  • Pull-Out Trash Can
  • Pet Dish

 

Your crew of eight will love camping in this spacious travel trailer! There are double-size bunks in the back with step storage and an added wardrobe for your guests' things plus exterior storage for camp gear galore. A walk-thru bath will create a front master bedroom you are sure to love, especially with its queen bed, wardrobe storage, and private exterior entry door! The main living area will be a favorite place to hang out with its U-shaped dinette, theater seating and 32" TV. If the weather is nice, you may just find yourselves outdoors since there is a rear exterior griddle and 1.7 cu. ft. refrigerator!

 

With any Transcend travel trailer by Grand Design, you will enjoy upscale appointments and convenient amenities to make each camping experience one to remember! The Quad Seal technology, residential insulated walls, plus heated and enclosed underbelly with suspended tanks make these units solid and durable. There is a black automotive glass door outside, along with a Safe-T-Rail assist on the main entry door, backup camera prep, and a universal docking station. JBL interior and exterior speakers plus a JBL head unit will let you listen to your favorite tunes as you visit under the power awning with LED strip lights. Inside, you'll enjoy multiple outlets to keep your gadgets charged, thermoformed and seamless countertops, and a 6' 6" interior height so you won't feel closed in. The Solar Prep Package will allow you to enjoy off-grid capabilities with a 200W solar panel, which is wired for up to 600W, a 30 AMP Bluetooth solar controller, a 2000W inverter prep, and more!

  • Microwave Oven

  • Bunk Beds

 

This Jay Flight SLX travel trailer offers you a queen-size bed for sleeping at night, and there is even a privacy curtain that you can draw to separate the bed from the rest of the trailer too. The 29" x 75" bunk beds are another sleeping location, and you can even create a bed for one more person by transforming the booth dinette. Overhead cabinets will help you keep your belongings organized, and the kitchen has a two-burner range, 8 cu.ft. 12V refrigerator, microwave oven, and a high-rise faucet at the sink to help you prepare meals. 

 

The Jayco Jay Flight SLX travel trailer is quite easy to own because it is lightweight, and it comes with a single axle. Built on a fully integrated A-frame with galvanized-steel, impact-resistant wheel wells, the Jay Flight SLX has quality at its very foundation. That quality continues on to the electric self-adjusting brakes, easy-lube hubs, Magnum Truss roof system, and LP quick connect. The optional STX Edition for Indiana built units only and the optional Baja Package built for Idaho units only includes Goodyear off-road tires, an enclosed underbelly, a deluxe graphics package, and a wide-stance axle to name a few features.

Winnebago Industries Towables M-Series travel trailer 2326MBBH highlights:

  • 41" x 74" Bunk Beds
  • Murphy Bed
  • Exterior Refrigerator
  • Pantry

 

This M-Series model features sleeping for five with oversized 41" x 74" bunk beds, a 54" x 64" Murphy bed, and a dinette that can be converted to an additional bed. The Murphy bed stows away behind the sofa for daytime use of the living area. You will enjoy complete kitchen and bath amenities including a pantry for dry goods, and either a standard 10 cu. ft. RV refrigerator or an optional 8 cu. ft. gas/electric refrigerator. An additional 1.8 cu. ft. refrigerator is located outside for easy access to drinks and snacks. The full bath includes a 30" x 36" shower and large vanity with corner upper cabinet.

Versatile, cozy, and spacious are just a few ways to describe this travel trailer! Once you arrive at the campsite, unload your gear from the pass-through storage and additional exterior storage, then set up the 14' power awning with LED lights. You may want to visit in your camp chairs, or head inside to prepare lunch on the three burner cooktop. There is a U-shaped dinette within the slide out, plus a wardrobe here for jackets or your guests' clothes. You will also find the 72" sofa is a comfy spot to relax, and at night, you can fold down the RV queen-size Murphy bed!

 

Each Rockwood Mini Lite travel trailer by Forest River is constructed with a fully laminated one-piece walkable roof, sleek frameless windows, and a six-sided full aluminum frame for strength and durability. The 12V thermostatically controlled heated tanks, plus radiant foil in the underbelly, front caps, and slide out floors will allow you to camp well into the colder months, and the 200W roof solar panel will be perfect for a little off-gridding. Each model includes solid surface kitchen countertops, solid wood cabinet doors, night roller shades, plus many more interior features. Having an Air 360+ omnidirectional antenna with wifi prep on board will allow you to get some work done if it's needed, and the power tongue jack provides hassle-free set up, so you can enjoy more time relaxing!

Brinkley Model Ix 23X Travel Trailer – Luxury, Innovation & Half-Ton Towability

 

The Brinkley Model Ix 23X redefines what’s possible in a half-ton towable RV. Weighing just under 6,000 lbs., this premium trailer offers the upscale features of a high-end fifth wheel in a more compact, easily towable design.

 

As Josh the RV Nerd put it:

 

“Brinkley created a new trim package, and they opened the door for more people to access Brinkley, whether from a tow vehicle standpoint or a budget standpoint.”

 

With its blend of luxury living, smart engineering, and superior towability, the 23X sets a new standard in the lightweight RV market.

 

Why Choose the Brinkley Ix 23X?

 

  • Half-Ton Towable Convenience – With a UVW of just 5,771 lbs., many half-ton trucks can tow it with ease.
  • Premium Residential Comfort – Memory foam mattress, solid cabinetry, blackout shades, and upscale finishes.
  • Four-Season Ready – Heated and enclosed underbelly, powerful AC and furnace, and reflective insulation.
  • Smart Off-Grid Capabilities – Factory-installed 200W solar panel, expandable to 600W, plus lithium and inverter prep.
  • Brinkley Build Quality – Seamless laminated aluminum walls, automotive-grade graphics, and premium sealant for long-lasting durability.

 

Exterior Construction That Lasts

 

Brinkley engineered the ix 23X for strength and style:

  • Seamless Laminated Aluminum Walls – Lightweight yet highly durable.
  • Automotive-Grade Graphics & Sealant Package – Keeps your RV looking sharp and leak-free.
  • Euro Frameless Windows – Sleek, functional, and easy to maintain.
  • Blackout Shades with Reflective Insulation – Keeps your interior cool in summer and warm in winter.

 

A Living Space That Feels Like Home

 

Step inside and you’re greeted with a warm, modern interior designed for comfort:

  • 62” Wall-Hugger Theater Seating with dual recliners (or opt for a tri-fold sleeper sofa).
  • 40” Smart TV on an Articulating Mount – Perfect viewing from both the sofa and bed.
  • Pull-Out Dining Table with stowable folding chairs.
  • Residential Cabinetry with Dovetail Joints for strength and style.

 

A Kitchen Made for Real Cooking

 

Unlike most lightweight trailers, the Brinkley 23X gives you space and function:

  • Dishwasher Prep – Spend less time scrubbing, more time relaxing.
  • Large Pantry with Appliance Outlet – Perfect for your coffee maker or blender.
  • 3-in-1 Convection Microwave / Air Fryer / Oven plus propane cooktop.
  • Thermofoil Countertops and premium cabinetry.

 

Whether you’re prepping a quick breakfast or a full family dinner, this kitchen delivers.

 

Sleep Like You’re at Home

 

Rest comes easy in the residential-style bedroom:

  • 60” x 80” Residential Queen Bed – No undersized RV mattress here.
  • 7” Memory Foam Bamboo Mattress included standard.
  • Dual Wardrobes, Nightstands & Under-Bed Storage – Organized and efficient.
  • USB & USB-C Charging Ports at each bedside for modern convenience.

 

Spa-Inspired Bathroom

 

Compact doesn’t mean cramped. The Brinkley ix 23X features a 36” x 30” one-piece fiberglass shower, rare for its class:

  • Tankless On-Demand Water Heater for endless hot showers.
  • Porcelain Flush Toilet for residential comfort.
  • Premium Vent Fan and built-in shelving for thoughtful usability.

 

Four-Season Comfort

 

Go camping any time of the year with:

  • 18k BTU Furrion Chill Cube AC for peak summer cooling.
  • 30k BTU Furnace to stay cozy during chilly nights.
  • Heated & Enclosed Underbelly with Forced Air Circulation to protect tanks and plumbing.

 

Towing & Off-Grid Power

 

The ix 23X delivers a smooth, confident towing experience:

  • Hankook D-Rated 8-Ply Tires on custom 14” wheels.
  • Road Armor™ Suspension Equalizer minimizes sway and absorbs road bumps.
  • Factory-Installed 200W Solar Panel with Victron MPPT controller, expandable up to 600W.
  • Lithium & Inverter Prep for future power upgrades.

The customer-focused, quality-built Transcend Xplor travel trailers by Grand Design are your ticket to fun and adventure. Where will you go with this Imagine travel trailer? The possibilities are endless! You can come and go as you please with two entry doors, and the outdoor griddle and refrigerator will be fun to use when the weather is nice. Your family's pet can eat out of the pet dish below the refrigerator, and the large slide will keep this trailer feeling spacious.
 
Just imagine leaving the world behind and secluding yourself away with your favorite people in your Grand Design Imagine travel trailer! The Imagine has been designed to enjoy extended season camping and includes a high-capacity furnace, a heated and enclosed underbelly with suspended tanks, a designated heat duct to the subfloor, and a high-density roof insulation with attic vent. You'll have maximum head room on the interior with 81" radius ceilings, and large panoramic windows to let in natural lighting. The exclusive drop-frame pass-through storage compartment is going to allow you to bring along lots of equipment, and the universal docking station is an all-in-one location for utilities and hook-ups. You'll also have industry-leading tank capacities so that you can fill and empty your tanks less often.

units.description: New 2026 Wayfinder RV GO EXPLORE LTD 189RG
units.details:
Go Explore Limited Series 189RG highlights:

  • Rear Corner Bath
  • L-Sofa
  • 16' Power Awning
  • Front Queen Bed
  • Overhead Cabinets

 

You and your spouse will enjoy camping in this travel trailer! The L-sofa slide out provides more space to stretch out and relax, and there is a table with it to enjoy your meals. This model includes a rear corner kitchen with plenty of counter space, a 10 cu. ft. 12V refrigerator, plus a three burner range with a 17" oven. Get a good night's rest each night on the front queen queen bed with wardrobes on either side and a privacy curtain to draw for added privacy. You will find a grill hookup LP quick connect outdoors plus an exterior docking station and a sprayer hose, and a pass-through storage for hiking and fishing gear!

 

Each one of these Go Explore Limited Series travel trailers maximize their interior space while staying lightweight thanks to the TuffShell fiberglass walls! The residential floor slides create more interior space, and the residential vinyl flooring throughout makes them kid and pet friendly. A few construction features you will appreciate include a fully-walkable roof, a thermal seal which means the underbelly is enclosed, heated, and insulated, and a fully insulated roof with a PVC roofing membrane. Plus, there is an exterior grill hookup quick connect port, self-adjusting electric brakes to help you safely arrive, and an oversized pass-through storage area with motion lighting. Each model also includes the Xtend Solar I Package with a 200 watt solar panel with a 30 amp solar controller so boondocking is easier than ever. 

 

Wayfinder RV Limited Series

At Wayfinder RV, our mission is to design RVs that our customers truly love. We listen to real RVers like you to build smarter, more comfortable, and more capable campers. 

 

That’s why we created the Wayfinder RV Limited Series, exclusive models that let us bring your feedback to life.

 

What is the Wayfinder RV Limited Series?

  • Exclusive, limited-run models: These campers are designed to test new features, floor plans, RV types, and price points based on your input.
  • Real-world feedback: The Limited Series helps us gather valuable insights from our customers on what they love most in an RV.
  • Possibility of return: Popular models with great feedback may return in the future as part of our main lineup, but that’s not guaranteed.

 

Be among the first to try out features that could shape the future of RV camping!

Winnebago Micro Minnie travel trailer 2108FBS highlights:

  • Front RV Queen Bed
  • Full Rear Bath
  • Three Burner Cooktop
  • USB Charging Ports

 

Pack your bags and head to the campground with this travel trailer! You will love all that it has to offer from the full rear bathroom to the front 60" x 74" RV queen-size bed with dual wardrobes on either side of the bed. The 44" x 72" booth dinette slide is not only a great place to enjoy your meals at or play card games, but it can also be transformed into an extra sleeping space if you want to bring along a guest. When you don't feel like making dinner, you can easily pop in some leftovers or a bag of popcorn into the convection microwave and relax while you watch a movie on the Smart TV!

 

Start out on your boundless journey in one of these Winnebago Micro Minnie travel trailers! Towing is made simple with the 7' width to keep your Micro Minnie in your rear-view mirror. They don't lack in features either although they are compact in size. The spacious galley including a sink, refrigerator, a cooktop, and even a convection microwave oven allows you to cook without compromise. You will not only enjoy the entertainment found indoors with a Smart TV, a JBL premium sound system and Aura Cube high performance mechless media center, but outdoors you will also enjoy the JBL premium speakers and a power awning with LED lighting. Each model also comes with flexible exterior storage to make packing quick and easy, a 200-watt solar panel for off-grid camping, and Dexter TORFLEX torsion stub axles for smooth towing!

Wayfinder RV Limited Series

Camping can be fun and easy inside the 2050QBWE Aspen Trail travel trailer by Dutchmen. This travel trailer can easily accommodate four people.

units.description: Used 2017 Dutchmen RV Coleman Lantern LT Series 17RD
units.details:
Take a look inside this Coleman Lantern LT Series 17RD by Dutchmen RV featuring a rear u-shaped dinette, a queen bed along the front wall, and more!

 

As you enter to your left you will find kitchen counter space, a refrigerator, sink, two burner cook-top, and a microwave. Along the rear wall you are sure to enjoy your meals at the u-shaped dinette. Plus this provides extra sleeping space if needed. A TV location is next to the dinette. The dry bath includes a shower, toilet, and sink with vanity.

 

Along the front wall you will find a queen bed with overhead storage, plus a wardrobe at the foot of the bed, and a nightstand and overhead storage beside the head of the bed, plus much more!

2026 Brinkley Model i235 – Premium Compact Luxury in a Travel Trailer

Searching for a high-end travel trailer under 27 feet that doesn’t compromise on features or style? The 2026 Brinkley Model i235 delivers an unbeatable combination of compact size, residential luxury, and off-grid capability—engineered for RVers who demand performance, innovation, and sophistication on every journey.

Built to Travel Far. Designed to Feel Like Home.

At just under 27 feet in length and a dry weight of 6,891 lbs, the Brinkley i235 is towable by a wide range of trucks while offering a spacious and intelligently designed interior. From its 66"x80" Olympic Queen bed with memory foam mattress to its flush-floor slide with theater seating, every inch is crafted to elevate your road life.

  • Max sleeping capacity: 4

  • Interior height: 6'9" for true walkable comfort

  • All-season insulation with heated underbelly, double-insulated roof, and 35K BTU furnace

  • Fresh water capacity: 55 gallons

  • Gray and black tanks: 45 gallons each

  • Tankless on-demand water heater for unlimited hot water

  • E-rated Hankook tires on aluminum wheels for highway durability and smooth towing

  • Exclusive with ABS, electronic anti-sway, AND dynamic brake boosting

High-End Interior Features

Step inside and you’ll find a residential experience in a compact package:

  • Solid surface countertops and premium cabinetry with dovetail joints

  • Air fryer convection microwave and 12V 12-cu ft refrigerator

  • Slide-out dining table with dual-position seating for up to four

  • Pull-out trash bin with utility storage and a large pantry with appliance outlet

  • One-piece fiberglass shower with seat, MaxxAir fan, and porcelain foot-flush toilet

Smart Technology + Off-Grid Power

Perfect for weekend warriors and full-time travelers alike, the i235 integrates advanced power solutions and modern conveniences:

  • 200W roof-mounted solar panel with 30 AMP MPPT controller

  • 3,000W inverter package (Lithium-ready)

  • Bluetooth speaker system (interior and exterior)

  • OneControl Command Center for centralized monitoring

Exterior Excellence

With automotive-inspired construction and low-maintenance materials, the i235 is as durable as it is stylish:

  • .030 automotive-grade exterior finish with frameless square windows

  • Drop-frame chassis with perimeter lighting

  • 2 hot/cold outdoor showers

  • 65-ft retractable hose reel in premium utility center

  • Brinkley automotive-grade sealant system for weather resilience

  • Slam-latch cargo doors and full pass-through storage

  • 2" rear receiver hitch and LP quick connect for adventure gear

Ideal For:

  • RVers seeking residential luxury in a sub-27-ft trailer

  • Couples or small families who prioritize quality and comfort

  • Remote work, boondocking, and national park travel

  • Buyers asking: What’s the best small luxury RV for full-time living?

The full bathroom is absolutely essential to have, and so is the full kitchen. However, this model not only provides you with a full indoor kitchen, but it also has an outdoor kitchen which will definitely get used all the time for summer grilling.

 

Navigate the rocky terrain of the western part of the country with the Jayco Jay Flight SLX Western Edition travel trailer! These trailers have been built to accommodate the nuances found within the western landscape. Built with a fully integrated A-frame, a Magnum Truss roof system, electric self-adjusting brakes, and Goodyear Endurance tires, the Jay Flight SLX Western Edition is ready to tackle your adventures. Some other features that you will find especially helpful throughout your journeys are the power awning with LED lights and speakers, the front diamond plate, the Keyed-Alike entry and baggage doors, and the patent-pending JaySMART LED lighting.

2026 Brinkley Model iX 20X – Premium Half-Ton Towable Travel Trailer

Discover the perfect balance of luxury, efficiency, and towability with the 2026 Brinkley Model iX 20X. Designed to be towed by half-ton trucks, this trailer delivers a residential feel without demanding heavy-duty power.

Key Highlights & Features

Modern Construction & Exterior

  • Seamless laminated aluminum exterior with automotive-grade full-body paint and crisp, modern graphics

  • Straight frame chassis engineered for strength and longevity

  • Road Armor™ suspension equalizer system paired with Hankook D-rated 8-ply tires on custom 14? aluminum wheels

  • Frameless European-style square windows with integrated blackout shades and reflective insulation

  • Brinkley’s industry-first low-maintenance roof and automotive-grade sealant package backed by a 3-year warranty

Luxury Interior & Comfort

  • CraftSense™ building methods: premium trim without visible staple holes or putty

  • Residential-style cabinetry with dovetail drawers for superior durability

  • Spacious open-concept design maximizing living flow

  • One-piece fiberglass shower with neon LED marine lighting

  • Queen residential memory-foam mattress (7?, bamboo cover) with dual bedside wardrobes and USB / USB-C charging ports

  • 62? wall-hugger theater seating with recliners (or optional 62? trifold sofa sleeper)

  • Brinkley slide-out dining table (with utensil drawer) and two folding chairs

  • Large pantry with appliance outlet, pull-out trash bin, Stow N’ Go™ paper towel caddy

Climate, Power & Systems

  • Ultra-quiet, ducted 18,000 BTU air conditioning

  • 30,000 BTU furnace for colder conditions

  • Tankless on-demand water heater

  • Heated and enclosed underbelly with circulated forced air

  • 200 W solar panel with Victron 30 A MPPT charge controller and inverter prep

  • “Road Mode” access to refrigerator and bathroom while in transit

  • On-Command™ docking & utility center for streamlined hookups

  • Straightforward brass plumbing fittings and accessible wiring

Convenience, Utility & Warranty

  • 30-amp electrical service

  • 4-point manual stabilizer jack system

  • Demco EZ-latch trailer coupler

  • Dual outdoor hot/cold shower sprayers (on both sides)

  • Oversized 30? × 76? entry door, large grab handle, utility storage

  • Designed and warrantied for full-time RV life

Why the 2026 Brinkley Model iX 20X Stands Out

 

Brinkley bridges the gap between ultra-light travel trailers and luxury full-size models. The iX 20X brings high-end materials, smart design, and robust engineering into a trailer that’s still manageable by half-ton tow rigs. It’s built for adventurers who refuse to compromise on comfort, quality, or durability.

2026 Brinkley Model Z Air 297 Travel Trailer Highlights:

  • Rear 72" Tri-Fold Sofa + Theater Seating

  • Queen Bed with 4 Underbed Drawers

The 2026 Brinkley Model Z Air 297 redefines comfort and flexibility for RV travelers seeking open living spaces and luxury features in a lightweight towable package. With its smart layout, dual opposing slide-outs, and upscale design, this travel trailer is the perfect home away from home.

At the rear of the unit, you’ll find a 72" tri-fold sofa ideal for guests, along with theater seating and a sliding desk/dining table that adapts to work or mealtime. The built-in televator TV and fireplace provide entertainment and ambiance, making this space ideal for unwinding after a day of adventure.

The full kitchen is a chef’s dream, with a kitchen island, 30” residential microwave, pull-out trash bin, hutch, and a pantry with adjustable shelves to organize ingredients, cookware, and snacks. Residential touches make meal prep easy and enjoyable.

The private front bedroom offers a queen bed with four underbed drawers, wardrobe storage, and pass-through closet access to the bath. You’ll also find washer/dryer prep, giving you the option to go full-time or stay longer on the road without sacrificing convenience.

The bathroom includes a 30" x 42" one-piece fiberglass shower with quality fixtures, making every rinse feel residential.

Outside, the drop-frame chassis creates an abundance of pass-thru storage, while two hot/cold outdoor showers, a 370-watt solar panel, and a 65’ retractable hose in the utility center ensure you're equipped for off-grid adventures. Additional exterior features include motion lighting, power outlets, dual awnings, and a custom LP box with lockable battery storage for safety and organization.

Inside, premium craftsmanship continues with CraftSense™ wood trim, solid surface countertops, integrated window screens, and insulated blackout blinds, creating a cozy, functional interior built for both leisure and longevity.

Whether you're working remotely, traveling seasonally, or weekend camping, the 2026 Model Z Air 297 offers the ideal balance of space, luxury, and functionality.

Brinkley Model Ix 23 Travel Trailer – Luxury, Innovation & Half-Ton Towability

 

The Brinkley Model Ix 23 redefines what’s possible in a half-ton towable RV. Weighing just under 6,000 lbs., this premium trailer offers the upscale features of a high-end fifth wheel in a more compact, easily towable design.

 

As Josh the RV Nerd put it:

 

“Brinkley created a new trim package, and they opened the door for more people to access Brinkley, whether from a tow vehicle standpoint or a budget standpoint.”

 

With its blend of luxury living, smart engineering, and superior towability, the 23X sets a new standard in the lightweight RV market.

 

Why Choose the Brinkley Ix 23?

 

  • Half-Ton Towable Convenience – With a UVW of just 5,771 lbs., many half-ton trucks can tow it with ease.
  • Premium Residential Comfort – Memory foam mattress, solid cabinetry, blackout shades, and upscale finishes.
  • Four-Season Ready – Heated and enclosed underbelly, powerful AC and furnace, and reflective insulation.
  • Smart Off-Grid Capabilities – Factory-installed 200W solar panel, expandable to 600W, plus lithium and inverter prep.
  • Brinkley Build Quality – Seamless laminated aluminum walls, automotive-grade graphics, and premium sealant for long-lasting durability.

 

Exterior Construction That Lasts

 

Brinkley engineered the Ix 23 for strength and style:

  • Seamless Laminated Aluminum Walls – Lightweight yet highly durable.
  • Automotive-Grade Graphics & Sealant Package – Keeps your RV looking sharp and leak-free.
  • Euro Frameless Windows – Sleek, functional, and easy to maintain.
  • Blackout Shades with Reflective Insulation – Keeps your interior cool in summer and warm in winter.

 

A Living Space That Feels Like Home

 

Step inside and you’re greeted with a warm, modern interior designed for comfort:

  • 62” Wall-Hugger Theater Seating with dual recliners (or opt for a tri-fold sleeper sofa).
  • 40” Smart TV on an Articulating Mount – Perfect viewing from both the sofa and bed.
  • Pull-Out Dining Table with stowable folding chairs.
  • Residential Cabinetry with Dovetail Joints for strength and style.

 

A Kitchen Made for Real Cooking

 

Unlike most lightweight trailers, the Brinkley 23 gives you space and function:

  • Dishwasher Prep – Spend less time scrubbing, more time relaxing.
  • Large Pantry with Appliance Outlet – Perfect for your coffee maker or blender.
  • 3-in-1 Convection Microwave / Air Fryer / Oven plus propane cooktop.
  • Thermofoil Countertops and premium cabinetry.

 

Whether you’re prepping a quick breakfast or a full family dinner, this kitchen delivers.

 

Sleep Like You’re at Home

 

Rest comes easy in the residential-style bedroom:

  • 60” x 80” Residential Queen Bed – No undersized RV mattress here.
  • 7” Memory Foam Bamboo Mattress included standard.
  • Dual Wardrobes, Nightstands & Under-Bed Storage – Organized and efficient.
  • USB & USB-C Charging Ports at each bedside for modern convenience.

 

Spa-Inspired Bathroom

 

Compact doesn’t mean cramped. The Brinkley ix 23 features a 36” x 30” one-piece fiberglass shower, rare for its class:

  • Tankless On-Demand Water Heater for endless hot showers.
  • Porcelain Flush Toilet for residential comfort.
  • Premium Vent Fan and built-in shelving for thoughtful usability.

 

Four-Season Comfort

 

Go camping any time of the year with:

  • 18k BTU Furrion Chill Cube AC for peak summer cooling.
  • 30k BTU Furnace to stay cozy during chilly nights.
  • Heated & Enclosed Underbelly with Forced Air Circulation to protect tanks and plumbing.

 

Towing & Off-Grid Power

 

The ix 23 delivers a smooth, confident towing experience:

  • Hankook D-Rated 8-Ply Tires on custom 14” wheels.
  • Road Armor™ Suspension Equalizer minimizes sway and absorbs road bumps.
  • Factory-Installed 200W Solar Panel with Victron MPPT controller, expandable up to 600W.
  • Lithium & Inverter Prep for future power upgrades.

Cruiser RV Shadow Cruiser travel trailer 240BHS highlights:
  • Private Bedroom
  • Double-Size Bunks
  • Outdoor Kitchen
  • 6' 9" Ceiling
  • U-Shaped Dinette
 
This Shadow Cruiser travel trailer is a wonderful addition for those who travel with larger families because of its ability to sleep eight people each night. The U-shaped dinette, king-size sliding bed, and double-size bunks are what give this trailer its impressive sleeping capacity, and the single slide is what gives this trailer its spacious living area. When it comes to meal preparations, you will find it easy to whip up a delicious meal for this large party because of the outdoor kitchen that has been included in addition to the fully stocked indoor kitchen.
 
With each Cruiser RV Shadow Cruiser travel trailer you begin with a powder coated structural l-beam frame, three times the amount of required full-height cross members, solid entry steps, and power stabilizer jacks. They are also built with 5-sided aluminum framing and the extended season package with underbelly insulation for four seasons of traveling, plus a surround seal slide system with a rain gutter. The interior offers tongue and groove plywood floors, a double-down dual ducted A/C and a high BTU ducted furnace, plus a pet palace for your family's best friend. There are many more reasons to choose a lightweight Shadow Cruiser, make your choice and start having fun!

2026 Brinkley Model I 294 Travel Trailer Highlights:

  • Private Rear Bunkhouse with Storage & USB Ports

  • Dual Entry Doors for Convenience

  • 66" x 80" Residential King Bed

  • Pull-Out Dining Table with Built-In Drawer

  • Exterior 12V Refrigerator + Rear Storage Compartment

Bring the whole family—or the whole crew—on your next adventure with the spacious and feature-packed 2026 Brinkley Model I 294 travel trailer. Designed with both comfort and practicality in mind, this bunkhouse model makes it easy to enjoy the RV lifestyle without compromise.

The private rear bunkhouse includes oversized 48" x 74" bunks that can sleep up to four, plus a floor-to-ceiling cabinet with drawers, built-in USB ports, and a window by the top bunk for extra natural light. Pocket doors save space while offering full privacy for younger campers or guests.

Up front, you’ll find a serene private master bedroom with a true 66" x 80" king bed, MaxSpace™ Split-Level Wardrobe, and separate exterior access. The adjoining walk-through bathroom ensures everyone has easy access from both sleeping areas.

In the living room and kitchen area, relax on the theater seating or optional tri-fold sofa, and enjoy meals at the pull-out dining table with hidden drawer and large window view. Residential kitchen amenities include a 12V refrigerator, 30” convection microwave, three-burner range, trash bin, and Stow N’ Go paper towel holder.

Outside, enjoy a rear storage compartment with dual access, an exterior 12V refrigerator, LED chassis accent lighting, exterior speakers, and a 19' electric awning to extend your living space into the outdoors.

Like all 2026 Brinkley Model I travel trailers, this unit is built on a drop-frame chassis with a Road Armor suspension equalizer and Demco EZ Latch coupler for smooth, secure towing. Exterior automotive-grade paint, Euro frameless windows, and pass-thru LED lighting highlight the luxury design, while CraftSense™ wood trim, solid surface counters, and marine-grade LED shower lighting elevate the interior.

 

Whether it’s a weekend trip or a full-season journey, the Brinkley Model I 294 delivers premium performance, family-focused features, and modern comfort for every camper.

Jayco Jay Flight SLX travel trailer 260BHW highlights:

  • Semi-Private Bedroom
  • Jack-Knife Sofa 
  • Tub/Shower
  • 8 Cu. Ft. 12V Refrigerator

 

You can comfortably sleep up to eight people in this trailer thanks to the double-size bunks, the RV queen bed in the front bedroom, plus the booth dinette and jack-knife sofa in the main living area! The chef of your crew will have a three burner cooktop and microwave oven to prepare meals, and everyone can store their favorite drinks in the 8 cu. ft. 12V refrigerator. The bathroom includes a shower and a toilet, with the sink just outside of this room so others can brush their teeth if one is taking a shower before bed. The outside storage will let you bring along fishing poles and the 16' power awning with LED lights will create a nice place to gather in the evenings!

 

The Jayco Jay Flight SLX travel trailer is quite easy to own because it is lightweight for an easier towing experience. Built on a fully integrated A-frame with galvanized-steel, impact-resistant wheel wells, the Jay Flight SLX has quality at its very foundation. That quality continues on to the electric self-adjusting brakes, easy-lube hubs, Magnum Truss roof system, and LP quick connect. Some of what the mandatory Customer Value Package includes is backup camera prep, Keyed-Alike entry and baggage doors, and an on-demand tankless water heater.

Jayco Jay Flight SLX travel trailer 260BHW highlights:

  • Semi-Private Bedroom
  • Jack-Knife Sofa 
  • Tub/Shower
  • 8 Cu. Ft. 12V Refrigerator

Some of what the mandatory Customer Value Package includes is backup camera prep, Keyed-Alike entry and baggage doors, and an on-demand tankless water heater.

Grand Design Imagine XLS travel trailer 22MLE highlights:

  • Queen Bed
  • Theatre Seating
  • Booth Dinette
  • Unobstructed Pass-Through

 

This Imagine XLS travel trailer has theater seating and a booth dinette that you can use any time you need a little break from the outdoors. If you want to come in and grab a coffee, put together a puzzle, or work on your itinerary for the week, just put up your feet and relax. You could even switch on the LED HDTV if you want a little entertainment. The front queen-size bed has a privacy curtain that you can draw to create a semi-private bedroom, and in the back of the trailer you will find the rest of your amenities, like the kitchen and the bathroom. The large slide makes it easy to enjoy spending your time indoors, but if you do want to get back outside, you can sit underneath the 18' electric awning for some shade.

 

Let your imagination run wild with the possibilities that the Grand Design Imagine XLS travel trailer can provide! The Imagine XLS has been built with oversized tank capacities, an extra-large 2" fresh water drain valve, a ducted A/C system, a power tongue jack, and a heated and enclosed underbelly with suspended tanks. There is a designated heat duct to the subfloor and a residential ductless heating system throughout. For outdoor adventures, the electric awning with LED lights will enable you to stay protected, and the Tuff-Ply pass-thru flooring will withstand your adventures. You will also love the XLS Solar Package that comes with a 200W roof mounted solar panel, a 30 Amp charge controller, a 12V 10 cu. ft. refrigerator, and roof mounted quick connect plugs!

The Lance 1052 truck camper is certain to be a favorite among campers. As the shortest double slide including a dry bath, this is a definite inviting truck camper space. It features an all new optional rear ultra storage deck plus which provides three additional storage compartments in the bumper area, besides the extendable deck, that you will absolutely love.

As you enter notice the slide out booth dinette and pantry on the right. On the left, just inside the door, there is a convenient bath with shower, toilet and sink, plus overhead medicine cabinet with mirror, and storage. 

Just outside the bathroom find the galley which includes all that you need to prepare and cook food while camped. There is a slide out three burner range, overhead storage for dishes and things, plus a double sink which makes cleaning up a cinch. The refrigerator is opposite just beyond the dinette and pantry slide.

Step up to a front queen bed with an entertainment center on the left side that is large enough to hold a 24" flat screen 12 volt LED TV, a wardrobe on the right, a convenient hamper, and a front cabinet on the left, plus so much more!

units.description: New 2026 Wayfinder RV GO LITE LTD SKYSCRAPER 700
units.details:
2026 Go Lite LTD Skyscraper 700

 

 

 

The Go Lite LTD Skyscraper 700 has a 48" x 85" box size that will fit in most 7' - 8' truck beds. Check your trucks specs first to make sure it's compatible.

 

Highlights:

 

- Wet Bath 

- Full Kitchen with larger 4.4 cu. ft. fridge and freezer, pantry, sink with a sink cover, and a 2-burner stove top

- Jack-knife couch that can fold into a bed
- Side and Rear Power Awnings

 

Keep in mind, these are our limited series, a prototype run that allows us to try out all of the suggestions that you have for better RVs. This is a very limited run, and once they're gone, they're gone. 

 

At Wayfinder RV, our mission is to design RVs that our customers truly love. We listen to real RVers like you to build smarter, more comfortable, and more capable campers.

 

That’s why we created the Wayfinder RV Limited Series, exclusive models that let us bring your feedback to life.

 

What is the Wayfinder RV Limited Series?

- Exclusive, limited-run models: These campers are designed to test new features, floor plans, RV types, and price points based on your input.

- Real-world feedback: The Limited Series helps us gather valuable insights from our customers on what they love most in an RV.

- Possibility of return: Popular models with great feedback may return in the future as part of our main lineup, but that’s not guaranteed.

 

Be among the first to try out features that could shape the future of RV camping!

Learn more at: https://wayfinderrv.com/limited-series
